  Load packages and import data
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, data.table, coloc,TwoSampleMR, ggpubr, 
               ieugwasr, rio, here)

source("code/Functions.R")

here::i_am("analyses/JAK1.Rmd")

```

# eQTL

Import data 
```{r}
JAK1_eqtl <- import_data("data/export/JAK1_eqtl_TwoSampleMR.csv", 
                         "data/export/JAK1_T1D_TwoSampleMR.csv", has_beta = FALSE)
```



## Manhattan plots
```{r}
#create Manhattan plots with vertical lines indicating the selected area (see below 2.4)
manhattan_plots(JAK1_eqtl, gene_start = 65298912, 
                gene_end=65432187, 
                title = "JAK1")
ggsave("figures/JAK1-eqtl-manhattan-fig.png",
       height = 6, width = 8, units = "in")
```

## Coloc assuming 1 causal variant
```{r}
analyze_coloc_eqtl(JAK1_eqtl)
png("figures/JAK1-eQTL-T1D-coloc.png", units = "in", height = 6, width = 8, res = 300)
dev.off()
```
